Uses of Interface
net.jodah.failsafe.function.DelayFunction

  • Packages that use DelayFunction 
    Package Description
    net.jodah.failsafe
    Core Failsafe APIs for performing failsafe executions.

    • Uses of DelayFunction in net.jodah.failsafe

      Methods in net.jodah.failsafe that return DelayFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DelayFunction<R,? extends Throwable> DelayablePolicy.getDelayFn()
      Returns the function that determines the next delay before allowing another execution.

      Sets the delayFunction that computes the next delay before allowing another execution.
